content: It sounds like you're carrying a lot right now, Donna. Before we wrap up, is there anything else you'd like to make sure we address today?

I guess... the main thing is just feeling like I'm not as efficient at work as I used to be. I stay late to catch up, but it's hard. Honestly, I don't know if it's just me getting older or if there's something else. And... I've been drinking a bit more, but it's just to unwind, you know? My husband says I need to 'take a break,' but I can't afford to let things slip. It's just... systems errors, right? They can be patched.

It sounds like work stress and self-criticism are really wearing on you right now. How often have you been drinking to unwind, and have you noticed any effects on your work performance or relationships?

It’s... one glass most nights. Sometimes two. After work, you know? Just to quiet the noise. My husband says it’s ‘not healthy,’ but I tell him it’s efficiency—wine as a temporary patch. I stay late to fix the leaks, but… I’m not sure it’s enough. The numbers in my head don’t add up lately. I guess it’s just… stress.
